column5: Our guest room is just up the street from Zilker Park, Barton Springs, and within a one mile walk of some of Austin's best restaurants and live music spots. The room is clean and recently constructed, with a private entrance and walk-in accessible shower. We provide a microwave, coffee pot, and a mini-fridge, as well as an assortment of coffee and tea. For a small fee you can reserve a continental breakfast. With 1 queen bed and 1 full bed, 2 people will be very comfortable.
column8: Murphy Oaks Guestroom:Your Sweet Retreat in Zilker
